snippet: If the Scots vote "yes" to splitting from England, it will cause a political earthquake and whet appetites for self-rule from Catalonia to Flanders.
lead_paragraph: If the Scots vote "yes" to splitting from England, it will cause a political earthquake and whet appetites for self-rule from Catalonia to Flanders.

headline.print_headline: Scotland's Vote Could Rekindle Other Separatist Movements
headline.main: Scotland's Vote Could Rekindle Other Separatist Movements
